text: The 20th TVyNovelas Awards, is an Academy of special awards to the best of soap operas and TV shows. The awards ceremony took place on July 4, 2002, in the Mexico D.F. The ceremony was televised in the Mexico by Canal de las estrellas. Raúl Velasco, Ernesto Laguardia, Luis de la Corte and Gloria Calzada hosted the show. El Manantial won 8 awards including Best Telenovela of the Year, the most for the evening. Other winners Amigas y rivales and Salomé won 2 awards and Entre el Amor y el Odio and Sin pecado concebido won one each. == Summary of awards and nominations == {| class="wikitable sortable" style="margin:1em auto;" !
